revised_title: Analytical Experiments and Observations on the Preparation and Properties of Lac
tldr: The author investigates the properties and preparation methods of lac, a substance derived from the insect Coccus lacca. He examines the differences between stick lac, seed lac, shell lac, and lump lac, and discusses their uses and chemical compositions. The author also explores the historical and chemical knowledge of lac and its applications in various arts and industries.
